name: wid3_F2F2_module14
label: F2F 2: PAPI children (PAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: cultural capital: availability of cultural property; cultural capital: reading, classical music, cultural discussion, cultural participation; depression screening; domain-specific satisfaction (health, work/school, income/pocket money, leisure time, family life, partnership, friendships); global life satisfaction; locus of control; music lessons; optimism; patience; perceived self-efficacy; personality measures (BIG5); risk aversion; self esteem; sensory-processing sensitivity; social capital of individuals, e.g., close friends, frequency of social contacts, loneliness; social participation: frequency of attendance in sports clubs, theatre, music groups or volunteer organizations; stress regulation and coping; use of electronic media devices (time spent with, e.g., computer, internet, etc.), rules for media use.

cul0100.question: cul0100
cul0100.name: cul0100
cul0100.label: [IF age <= 15] How much time, on average, do you spend reading in your free time each day? Please consider all possible occasions when you read, not only books or magazines, but also e-mails or material on the Internet.
cul0100.label_de: [IF age <= 15 ] Wie viel Zeit verbringst Du im Durchschnitt taeglich damit, in Deiner Freizeit zu lesen? Denke dabei bitte an alle moeglichen Gelegenheiten, bei denen Du liest, also nicht nur Buecher oder Zeitschriften, sondern auch E-Mails oder im Internet.

gls0600.question: gls0600
gls0600.name: gls0600
gls0600.label: Below we would like to know how satisfied you are with your life in general. You can agree or disagree with the following statements. Please answer on a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 is strongly disagree and 5 means strongly agree.
gls0600.label_de: [IF age >=10 AND <= 15] Im Folgenden wuerden wir gerne wissen, wie zufrieden Du ganz allgemein mit Deinem Leben bist. Es folgen einige Aussagen dazu, denen Du zustimmen bzw. die Du ablehnen kannst.

items.text: Below we would like to know how satisfied you are with your life in general. You can agree or disagree with the following statements. Please answer on a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 is strongly disagree and 5 means strongly agree.
items.text_de: [IF age >=10 AND <= 15] Im Folgenden wuerden wir gerne wissen, wie zufrieden Du ganz allgemein mit Deinem Leben bist. Es folgen einige Aussagen dazu, denen Du zustimmen bzw. die Du ablehnen kannst.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: In most ways, my life is close to the way I would want it to be.
items.text_de: Im Grossen und Ganzen ist mein Leben so wie ich es mir wuensche.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: The things in my life are excellent.
items.text_de: Mein Leben ist grossartig.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: I am happy with my life.
items.text_de: Ich bin mit meinem Leben gluecklich.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: So far, I have gotten the important things I want in life.
items.text_de: Ich habe bisher die wichtigen Dinge, die ich mir vom Leben wuensche, auch bekommen.
items.description: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247
items.description_de: Source: Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for Children; Gadermann, A. M., Schonert-Reichl, K. A., & Zumbo, B. D. (2010). Investigating validity evidence of the Satisfaction with Life Scale adapted for children. Social Indicators Research, 96, 229-247

items.text: If I could live my life over, I would have it the same way.

per0200.question: per0200
per0200.name: per0200
per0200.label: Would you describe yourself as someone who is willing to take risks or as someone who tries to avoid risks? In other words, do you often try things that could go wrong, or do you prefer to play it safe?
per0200.label_de: Wie schaetzt Du Dich ein? Bist Du im Allgemeinen ein risikobereiter Mensch oder versuchst Du, Risiken zu vermeiden? Das heisst, unternimmst Du haeufig Dinge, die moeglicher-weise schiefgehen koennen, oder versuchst Du eher auf 'Nummer sicher' zu gehen? Der Wert 1 bedeutet: Gar nicht risikobereit. Der Wert 11 bedeutet: Sehr risikobereit. Mit den Werten dazwischen kannst Du Deine Einschaetzung abstufen.
